trans-unit.source: Creating a working new project only requires a couple lines:
trans-unit.target: 创建一个工作的新项目只需要几行字。

trans-unit.source: Djangofloor helps you to quickly create Django applications that are also easy to deploy. To reach these goals, Djangofloor provides:
trans-unit.target: Djangofloor可以帮助你快速创建Django应用,同时也易于部署。为了达到这些目标,Djangofloor提供了。

trans-unit.source: Simple configuration management and websockets with Django.
trans-unit.target: 使用Django进行简单的配置管理和websockets。

trans-unit.source: a base template using the well-known Bootstrap3 (but of course you can use any other templates),
trans-unit.target: 使用著名的Bootstrap3的基础模板(当然你也可以使用其他模板)。

trans-unit.source: an extension to the base Django's setting, allowing to split your configuration into several files (default values provided by Djangofloor, constants values for your project, deployement parameters, local values for development),
trans-unit.target: 对Django基础设置的扩展,允许将你的配置分成多个文件(Djangofloor提供的默认值、项目的常量值、部署参数、开发的本地值)。

trans-unit.source: an unified signal dispatcher, using bi-directionnal websockets through Celery and Redis. You can call Python and Javascript signals from the Python or the Javascript side,
trans-unit.target: 一个统一的信号分配器,通过Celery和Redis使用双向web套接字。你可以从Python或Javascript端调用Python和Javascript信号。

trans-unit.source: auto-configuration for a few widespread Django apps (Django-Debug-Toolbar, Django-Redis-Sessions, Django-Pipeline) if they are present,
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一些广泛的Django应用(Django-Debug-Toolbar,Django-Redis-Sessions,Django-Pipeline)的自动配置。

trans-unit.source: create new Django projects that are working and deployable out-of-the-box (even if you finally replace all default templates and views).
trans-unit.target: 创建新的Django项目,这些项目是可以工作的,并且是可以开箱即用的(即使你最终更换了所有的默认模板和视图)。
有效的默认Django设置(如日志)。
